questions.question_text: Which benefit does Amazon Rekognition provide?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. The ability to detect objects that appear in pictures

"Rekognition Image is an image recognition service that detects objects, scenes, activities, landmarks, faces, dominant colors, and image quality. Rekognition Image also extracts text, recognizes celebrities, and identifies inappropriate content in images. It also allows you to search and compare faces."

https://aws.amazon.com/rekognition/faqs/?nc=sn&loc=7

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

choices.C: The ability to resize millions of images automatically
choices.D: The ability to bid on object detection jobs
choices.B: The ability to detect objects that appear in pictures
choices.A: The ability to place watermarks on images

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Hybrid

"AWS Outposts is a family of fully managed solutions delivering AWS infrastructure and services to virtually any on-premises or edge location for a truly consistent hybrid experience. Outposts solutions allow you to extend and run native AWS services on premises, and is available in a variety of form factors, from 1U and 2U Outposts servers to 42U Outposts racks, and multiple rack deployments."

https://aws.amazon.com/outposts/

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
google search --> https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/faq/

questions.question_text: Which AWS Cloud deployment model uses AWS Outposts as part of the application deployment infrastructure?
Which AWS service aggregates organizes and prioritizes security alerts and findings from multiple AWS services?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

Selected Answer: D
D. AWS Security Hub

"AWS Security Hub is a cloud security posture management (CSPM) service that performs automated, continuous security best practice checks against your AWS resources to help you identify misconfigurations, and aggregates your security alerts (i.e. findings) in a standardized format so that you can more easily enrich, investigate, and remediate them. "


https://aws.amazon.com/security-hub/faqs/?nc=sn&loc=5&dn=2

AWS Security Hub aggregates, normalizes, and prioritizes security alerts, or findings, from AWS and third-party services, as well as generating its own findings as the result of running continuous and automated configuration checks.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
D. AWS Organizations

"AWS Organizations is an account management service that enables you to consolidate multiple AWS accounts into an organization that you create and centrally manage. AWS Organizations includes account management and consolidated billing capabilities that enable you to better meet the budgetary, security, and compliance needs of your business. As an administrator of an organization, you can create accounts in your organization and invite existing accounts to join the organization."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/organizations/latest/userguide/orgs_introduction.html

Selected Answer: D
Anytime you see "consolidated billing" is AWS Organizations.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

questions.question_text: A user is able to set up a management payer account to view consolidated billing reports through.
Which of the following are user authentication services managed by AWS? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
A. Amazon Cognito
D. AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

"Amazon Cognito helps you implement customer identity and access management (CIAM) into your web and mobile applications. You can quickly add user authentication and access control to your applications in minutes."


https://aws.amazon.com/cognito/

Selected Answer: AD
AD is the answer.
